relproducts.title: Radiance Pumice Roman Blind
relproducts.description: This eye-catching embroidered pattern creates a stunning visual effect that jumps out, giving great movement and interest to the fabric. The radiance pumice natural roman blind is made up of tiny diamonds in a flowing pattern of oval shapes. This graphic in an earthy natural hue has a bohemian vibe that will look great within an eclectic or retro styled space.
